data.enText: connected with soldiers or the armed forces
We may have to take military action.
data.chText: 我们可能不得不采取军事行动。

data.enText: We may have to intervene militarily in the area.
data.chText: 我们可能只好对这一地区进行军事干涉。

data.hoverText: 可与单数或复数动词连用的单数名词

data.enText: The military was/were called in to deal with the riot.

tr: the military forces of a nation
example: their military is the largest in the region
the military machine is the same one we faced in 1991 but now it is weaker

tr: associated with or performed by members of the armed services as contrasted with civilians
characteristic of or associated with soldiers or the military
of or relating to the study of the principles of warfare

example.tran: 也许有必要采取军事行动。

example.ex: The president is sending in almost 20,000 military personnel to help with the relief efforts.
example.tran: 总统将派出近2万名军事人员协助救灾工作。

value.def: Military means relating to the armed forces of a country.

example.ex: They remain unwilling to intervene militarily in what could be an unending war...
example.tran: 他们仍然不愿意对一场可能会旷日持久的战争进行军事干预。

example.ex: While that option would incur fewer casualties, it would not be militarily effective.
example.tran: 尽管那种选择造成的伤亡人数可能会更少，却并不能取得军事上的胜利。

example.ex: The attack has caused severe damage to American naval and military forces.
example.tran: 这次攻击给美国的海军和陆军都造成了重创。

value.def: Military means relating to or belonging to the army, rather than to the navy or the air force.

example.ex: The bombing has been far more widespread than the military will admit...
example.tran: 轰炸的范围远远大于军方愿意承认的范围。

example.ex: Did you serve in the military?

value.def: The military are the armed forces of a country, especially officers of high rank.
value.tran: 军队;军人;(尤指)高级军官

example.ex: Your working day will need to be organized with military precision.
example.tran: 需要对你的工作日进行精确有序的安排。

example.ex: He has a military bearing, never failing to carry himself erect.
example.tran: 他有一种军人的风姿，身板总是挺得笔直。

value.def: Military means well-organized, controlled, or neat, in a way that is typical of a soldier.

trans: 軍訓；军训；军事训练；军训的看法；大学生军训
陆军学校；军事学院；军校；军事院校；军事学校
军事科学总论；军事科学；兵法家；军事学；军事
（国际法）（对军事占领区的）军事管制政府；军人政府
军用飞机；军用航空器；军机
军事物流；军事后勤；后勤学；军事后勤学；军事运筹
戎衣；军服；求购军队制服；军用制服；求购军装

partsOfSpeech.dec: ne- 不,非 + cess 行走,撤退 + -ary ...的
con- 共同,一起 + tempor 时间 + -ary ...的

partsOfSpeech.d: 预备性的, 初步的, 开始的
partsOfSpeech.dec: pre- ...前的 + limin 门槛,限制 + -ary ...的
stat- 站,立 + -ion 行为,状态 + -ary ...的
anni- 年,一年 + vers 转 + -ary ...的
